short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily discover, copy, and change webpage colors and fonts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🎨 Desiqo is an easy-to-use Chrome extension for designers, developers, and anyone interested in webpage design. 
Quickly view, copy, and edit the colors and fonts on any site.
Perfect for exploring new design ideas, understanding webpage styles, or customizing designs on the go.

Key Features:

✔️ Extract Colors and Fonts: Instantly get the color palette and font styles used on any webpage.
✔️ Edit and Test: Change colors and fonts in real time to see how new styles look.
✔️ Copy Colors and Fonts: Quickly copy colors or fonts to use in your own designs or projects.
✔️ Enhance Your Workflow: Streamline your design process by learning from the web's best.

🚀 More features and updates are coming soon!

📬 Questions or feedback? Reach us at contact@desiqo.site for suggestions or feature requests.
